        public static void ϑd​(double x,
                      double y,
                      double[] z)
        Derivative of The Riemann-Siegel ϑ function
        Parameters:
        x - real part
        y - imaginary part
        z - upon return is set to [Re(ϑ(x+iy)),Im(ϑ(x+iy))]
